trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin is in a stink over an attack on a caravan.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the cranky Kojin on the Isle of Bekko.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_TODO_01<tab>Seek out Red Kojin and smear them with golden aspic upon their defeat.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>The Red, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─they have fallen upon one of our caravans!
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>By the grace of the kami, we were able to protect the goods, but the Red brigands remain at large. I need you to join us in hunting them down.

TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Once you have found and given them a trouncing, smear this all over them. Golden aspic, it is called, and it is made by─actually, 'tis best that you do not know. The point is it smells foul, and will serve to teach the offending Reds a lesson.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_003<tab>Even as we speak, one of our sisters is scouring the Isle of Bekko for them. Seek her out first, and she will tell you more.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_KOJINFEMALE02979_000_020<tab>The Red brigands struck fast, but they fled even faster. If you would search the northern shoreline, I will see to the rest of the isle.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_KOJINFEMALE02979_000_021<tab>And as Zukin will have told you, after you subdue the villains, you are to smear golden aspic all over them. Do not forget this step.
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_BALLOON_000_011<tab>Hmph! And I was so close to the water!
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_BALLOON_100_013<tab>What the─ Uhhh... I'm going to be─ Hurrrgh!
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>Ah, you are returned. Were you able to find and punish the Red in the manner prescribed?
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_031<tab>Haha, well done, my friend! Our comrades shall be pleased to learn that you have dealt with the brigands!
TEXT_BANKJN301_02979_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>The poor sods will reek for a good while, and until such time as the odor fades, they are like to be spurned by their own. A fine lesson, yes?
